name: Giant Rat
description: A larger, aggressive version of a common rat, found in dark, abandoned areas. It has sharp teeth and claws, and its pack mentality makes it dangerous in groups.
memorable: Known for its ability to overwhelm opponents in swarms, and its bites can spread diseases.
goals: Scavenging for food, including carrion, while hunting in packs.
relations: Often found in abandoned buildings or dungeons; can be encountered with other vermin.
environment: Dark, abandoned areas like sewers, dungeons, or ruined buildings.
strengths: Pack tactics grant advantages when attacking in groups; keen smell enhances its perception.
weaknesses: Individually weak and easily dispatched by stronger characters.
attacks: Bite action that deals piercing damage and has a chance to spread disease.
most_powerful_ability: Pack Tactics provide advantages when coordinating attacks with allies.
senses: Heightened sense of smell gives it an effective Perception score of 15 when tracking.
skills: Good at hiding, reflected by a Stealth score of 15.
additional_information: Accustomed to Filth gives advantage on saves against diseases.
Can overwhelm targets when in swarms.
Capable of gnawing through wood and stone.
Coordinated attacks make it a greater challenge.
test_queries: agile rat that hunts in packs
fast scurrying monster with sharp teeth
